snippet.title: Road Island Adventure Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
🚗 Welcome to Road Island Adventure! 🚗
An open-world RPG set in a world of living cars!
Compete in high-stakes races, explore a vibrant island using diverse gadgets, build your own town, recruit teammates, complete quests, gather resources, and uncover the mystery behind a strange signal. Adventure and discovery await!

🎮 Wishlist on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3414890/Road_Island_Adventure/

🤝 Join the Discord:
https://discord.com/invite/NMWScwh9nU

💡 Check out the IndieGoGo campaign:
https://igg.me/at/roadislandadventure
